ml:body.p: Just a brief update to let you know there's a whole lotta goodness going on.

ul.li: Clark Richey pushed 0.3 of ActiveDocument to rubygems.
Keith Breinholt published 1.0 of XQDebug and
Pete Aven pushed 1.2.1 of MarkLogic Toolkit for Word
Pete also wrote up an awesome description of the face-melting Sample Authoring Application for Word
Norm Walsh has kindly published his MarkLogic AtomPub Server
